title: 273. Andy & DJ CTI: Trump Endorses Dr. Oz, USPS Stops Deliveries In CA & Pfizer Hires 600 Employees
itunes:title: 273. Andy & DJ CTI: Trump Endorses Dr. Oz, USPS Stops Deliveries In CA & Pfizer Hires 600 Employees
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss former President Donald Trump's endorsement of Dr. Oz, USPS stopping its deliveries to California neighborhoods after repeated attacks on mail carriers, and Pfizer hiring 600 employees due to a large increase of adverse event reports.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss former President Donald Trump's endorsement of Dr. Oz, USPS stopping its deliveries to California neighborhoods after repeated attacks on mail carriers, and Pfizer hiring 600 employees due to a large increase of adverse event reports.
